tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE compliance_checks (
    check_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    check_name VARCHAR(255),
    check_type VARCHAR(50),
    check_date DATE,
    check_status BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE compliance_checks (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    check_name VARCHAR(255),
    regulatory_requirement VARCHAR(255),
    target_department VARCHAR(255),
    check_result BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE audits (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    audit_date DATE,
    auditor_name VARCHAR(255),
    audit_type VARCHAR(255),
    department_under_audit VARCHAR(255),
    audit_result VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE ComplianceChecks (
    audit_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    auditor_name VARCHAR(50),
    audit_date DATE,
    compliance_result VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE RegulatoryRequirements (
    requirement_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    requirement_description TEXT,
    regulation_date DATE,
    compliance_status VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE AuditHistory (
    audit_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    audit_date DATE,
    auditor_name VARCHAR(50),
    compliance_result VARCHAR(50),
    remarks TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE AuditParticipants (
    participant_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    participant_name VARCHAR(50),
    role VARCHAR(50),
    department VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE ComplianceIssues (
    issue_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    audit_id INT,
    issue_description TEXT,
    status VARCHAR(50)
)
